contentrichtext.text: '''Vila Verde''' may refer to: ==Places== ===Portugal=== * [[Vila Verde Municipality]], a municipality in the district of Braga ** Vila Verde (Vila Verde), a civil parish in that municipality of Vila Verde * Vila Verde (Alijó), a civil parish in that municipality of [[Alijó Municipality|Alijó]] * Vila Verde (Felgueiras), a civil parish in that municipality of [[Felgueiras Municipality|Felgueiras]] * Vila Verde (Figueira da Foz), a civil parish in that municipality of [[Figueira da Foz Municipality|Figueira da Foz]] * Vila Verde (Mirandela), a civil parish in that municipality of [[Mirandela Municipality|Mirandela]] * Vila Verde (Vinhais), a civil parish in that municipality of [[Vinhais Municipality|Vinhais]] * Vila Verde da Raia, a civil parish in that municipality of [[Chaves Municipality, Portugal|Chaves]] * Vila Verde de Ficalho, a civil parish in that municipality of [[Serpa Municipality|Serpa]] * [[Vila Verde dos Francos]], a civil parish in that municipality of Alenquer {{geodis}}
